name.description: A human-readable name for the application.

short_name.description: A short, machine-readable name for the application. This can only be defined on resource creation and ignored on resource update.

stack_id.description: The id of the stack the application will belong to.

type.description: The type of source to use. For example, "archive".

environment.description: Object to define environment variables.  Object is described below.

enable_ssl.description: Whether to enable SSL for the app. This must be set in order to let `ssl_configuration.private_key`, `ssl_configuration.certificate` and `ssl_configuration.chain` take effect.

ssl_configuration.description: The SSL configuration of the app. Object is described below.

app_source.description: SCM configuration of the app as described below.

data_source_type.description: The data source's type one of `AutoSelectOpsworksMysqlInstance`, `OpsworksMysqlInstance`, or `RdsDbInstance`.

domains.description: A list of virtual host alias.

document_root.description: Subfolder for the document root for application of type `rails`.

auto_bundle_on_deploy.description: Run bundle install when deploying for application of type `rails`.

rails_env.description: The name of the Rails environment for application of type `rails`.

aws_flow_ruby_settings.description: Specify activity and workflow workers for your app using the aws-flow gem.

url.description: The URL where the app resource can be found.

username.description: Username to use when authenticating to the source.

password.description: Password to use when authenticating to the source. Terraform cannot perform drift detection of this configuration.

ssh_key.description: SSH key to use when authenticating to the source. Terraform cannot perform drift detection of this configuration.

revision.description: For sources that are version-aware, the revision to use.

secure.description: Set visibility of the variable value to `true` or `false`.

private_key.description: The private key; the contents of the certificate's domain.key file.

certificate.description: The contents of the certificate's domain.crt file.

chain.description: Can be used to specify an intermediate certificate authority key or client authentication.
